Do NOT get this horrible app!!!!! When I first started downloading it, it took 5 WEEKS to download!!!! I got this app to support my lOvInG and AmAzIng president (cause I didnâ€™t know all a president cares abt is fame, clothes and an app.) and it asked for my location and phone number and I of course gave it to the app with prayers heâ€™d come to my door so I can greet him, BUT it sent random people to my house and they were harassing me and throwing rocks at my windows!!! This is horrible that this app caused that! The next week my phone began glitching, getting hacked and spam phone calls/texts!! It was horrific and very scary!
I had just bought $800 worth of merch but I sadly had to walk my oven and never got back to it! SO DO NOT GET THIS APP, it will hack your phone and send scary people to your house! I was scared for my life you guys!! Since this is a review I must put everything that happened..ğŸ˜­
